item.text: Now faith is being sure of what we hope for, being convinced of what we do not see.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">it</st> the <st data-num="4245">people of old</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3140">received</st> God’s <st data-num="3140" class="">commendation</st>.<n id="2" />

By <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> we <st data-num="3539" class="">understand</st> that the <st data-num="165" class="">worlds</st><n id="1" /> were <st data-num="2675">set in order</st> at <st data-num="2316" class="">God’s</st> <st data-num="4487" class="">command</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">so that</st> the <st data-num="991" class="">visible</st> has its <st data-num="1096" class="">origin</st> in the <st data-num="3361 5316">invisible</st>.<n id="3" />

By <st data-num="4102">faith</st> <st data-num="6" class="">Abel</st> <st data-num="4374" class="">offered</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> a <st data-num="4183">greater</st> <st data-num="2378" class="">sacrifice</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">than</st> <st data-num="2535" class="">Cain</st>, and <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> his <st data-num="3739" class="">faith</st><n id="1" /> he was <st data-num="3140" class="">commended</st> <st data-num="1510">as</st> <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st> because <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3140" class="">commended</st> him <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1435" class="">offerings</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="1223">his faith</st><n id="2" /> he <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speaks</st>, though he is <st data-num="599" class="">dead</st>.

By <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="1802" class="">Enoch</st> was <st data-num="3346" class="">taken up</st> so that he did <st data-num="3361">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> to be <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="1360" class="">because</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3346" class="">took</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3346" class="">up</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> his <st data-num="3331" class="">removal</st> he had been <st data-num="3140" class="">commended</st> as having <st data-num="2100" class="">pleased</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="5565" class="">without</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> it is <st data-num="102" class="">impossible</st> to <st data-num="2100" class="">please</st> him, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the one who <st data-num="4334" class="">approaches</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">exists</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="3406" class="">rewards</st> those who <st data-num="1567" class="">seek</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

By faith Noah, when he was warned about things not yet seen, with reverent regard constructed an ark for the deliverance of his family. Through faith he condemned the world and became an heir of the righteousness that comes by faith.
By faith Abraham obeyed when he was called to go out to a place he would later receive as an inheritance, and he went out without understanding where he was going.

By <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> he <st data-num="3939">lived as a foreigner</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1860" class="">promised</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">land</st> as <st data-num="5613" class="">though</st> it were a <st data-num="245">foreign country</st>, <st data-num="2730" class="">living</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4633" class="">tents</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="2464" class="">Isaac</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2384" class="">Jacob</st>, who were <st data-num="4789">fellow heirs</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="1860" class="">promise</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> he was <st data-num="1551">looking forward</st> to the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> <st data-num="2192">with</st> firm <st data-num="2310" class="">foundations</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="5079" class="">architect</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1217" class="">builder</st> is <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

By <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> though <st data-num="4564" class="">Sarah</st> <st data-num="846" class="">herself</st> was <st data-num="4723" class="">barren</st> and he was <st data-num="3844 2540">too</st> <st data-num="2244" class="">old</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> the <st data-num="1411" class="">ability</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2602 4690">procreate</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1893" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="2233" class="">regarded</st> the one who had <st data-num="1861" class="">given the promise</st> to be <st data-num="4103" class="">trustworthy</st>.
So in fact children were fathered by one man—and this one as good as dead—like the number of stars in the sky and like the innumerable grains of sand on the seashore.

<st data-num="3778" class="">These</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="599" class="">died</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">without</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">receiving</st> the things <st data-num="1860" class="">promised</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> they <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4207">in the distance</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="782" class="">welcomed</st> them <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3670" class="">acknowledged</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> they <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3581" class="">strangers</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3927" class="">foreigners</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> those who <st data-num="3004" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="5108">in such a way</st> <st data-num="1718" class="">make</st> it <st data-num="1718" class="">clear</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> they are <st data-num="1934" class="">seeking</st> a <st data-num="3968" class="">homeland</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">In fact</st>, <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> they had been <st data-num="3421" class="">thinking</st> of <st data-num="1545">the land</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> they had <st data-num="1544">left</st>, they would have <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="2540" class="">opportunity</st> to <st data-num="344" class="">return</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3568">as it is</st>,<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="3713" class="">aspire</st> to a <st data-num="2909" class="">better</st> land, <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st>, a <st data-num="2032">heavenly one</st>. <st data-num="1352" class="">Therefore</st>, <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1870" class="">ashamed</st> to be <st data-num="1941" class="">called</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> he has <st data-num="2090" class="">prepared</st> a <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

By <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st>, when he was <st data-num="3985" class="">tested</st>, <st data-num="4374" class="">offered up</st> <st data-num="2464" class="">Isaac</st>. He had <st data-num="324" class="">received</st> the <st data-num="1860" class="">promises</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">yet</st> he was ready to <st data-num="4374">offer up</st><n id="2" /> his <st data-num="3439">only son</st>.
God had told him, “Through Isaac descendants will carry on your name,”

and he <st data-num="3049" class="">reasoned</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1415" class="">could</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">raise</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="3850" class="">sense</st><n id="2" /> he <st data-num="2865" class="">received</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2865" class="">back</st> <st data-num="3606">from there</st>.

By <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2464" class="">Isaac</st> <st data-num="2127" class="">blessed</st> <st data-num="2384" class="">Jacob</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2269" class="">Esau</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">concerning</st> the <st data-num="3195" class="">future</st>.
By faith Jacob, as he was dying, blessed each of the sons of Joseph and worshiped as he leaned on his staff.
By faith Joseph, at the end of his life, mentioned the exodus of the sons of Israel and gave instructions about his burial.
By faith, when Moses was born, his parents hid him for three months because they saw the child was beautiful and they were not afraid of the king’s edict.

By <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, when he <st data-num="3173 1096">grew up</st>, <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="720" class="">refused</st> to be <st data-num="3004" class="">called</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="5328">Pharaoh’s</st> <st data-num="2364">daughter</st>,

<st data-num="138" class="">choosing</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">rather</st> to be <st data-num="4778" class="">ill-treated</st> with the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> to <st data-num="619" class="">enjoy</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin’s</st> <st data-num="4340">fleeting pleasure</st>.

He <st data-num="2233" class="">regarded</st> <st data-num="3680">abuse suffered</st> for <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="1" /> to be <st data-num="3173" class="">greater</st> <st data-num="4149" class="">wealth</st> than the <st data-num="2344" class="">treasures</st> of <st data-num="125" class="">Egypt</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> his <st data-num="578">eyes were fixed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="3405" class="">reward</st>.

By <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> he <st data-num="2641" class="">left</st> <st data-num="125" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">without</st> <st data-num="5399" class="">fearing</st> the <st data-num="935">king’s</st> <st data-num="2372" class="">anger</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> he <st data-num="2594" class="">persevered</st> as <st data-num="5613" class="">though</st> he could <st data-num="3708" class="">see</st> the one who is <st data-num="517" class="">invisible</st>.

By <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> he <st data-num="4160" class="">kept</st> the <st data-num="3957" class="">Passover</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4378" class="">sprinkling</st> of the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> the one who <st data-num="3645" class="">destroyed</st> the <st data-num="4416" class="">firstborn</st> would <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2345" class="">touch</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

By <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> they <st data-num="1224" class="">crossed</st> the <st data-num="2063" class="">Red</st> <st data-num="2281" class="">Sea</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> if <st data-num="1223" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3584" class="">dry</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st>, but when the <st data-num="124" class="">Egyptians</st> <st data-num="3984" class="">tried</st> it, they were <st data-num="2666" class="">swallowed up</st>.

By <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> the <st data-num="5038" class="">walls</st> of <st data-num="2410" class="">Jericho</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> after the people <st data-num="2944">marched around</st> them<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>.
By faith Rahab the prostitute escaped the destruction of the disobedient because she welcomed the spies in peace.
And what more shall I say? For time will fail me if I tell of Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jephthah, of David and Samuel and the prophets.

<st data-num="1223" class="">Through</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> they <st data-num="2610" class="">conquered</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdoms</st>, <st data-num="2038" class="">administered</st> <st data-num="1343" class="">justice</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2013" class="">gained</st> what was <st data-num="1860" class="">promised</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5420" class="">shut</st> the <st data-num="4750" class="">mouths</st> of <st data-num="3023" class="">lions</st>,

<st data-num="4570" class="">quenched</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">raging</st> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5343" class="">escaped</st> the <st data-num="4750" class="">edge</st> of the <st data-num="3162" class="">sword</st>, <st data-num="1412">gained strength</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="769" class="">weakness</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> <st data-num="2478" class="">mighty</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4171" class="">battle</st>, <st data-num="2827" class="">put</st> <st data-num="245" class="">foreign</st> <st data-num="3925" class="">armies</st> to <st data-num="2827" class="">flight</st>,

and <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">received back</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="386" class="">raised to life</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="243" class="">others</st> were <st data-num="5178" class="">tortured</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4327" class="">accepting</st> <st data-num="629" class="">release</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5177" class="">obtain</st> <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st> to a <st data-num="2909">better</st> life.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="2087" class="">others</st> <st data-num="3984" class="">experienced</st> <st data-num="1701" class="">mocking</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3148" class="">flogging</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1199" class="">chains</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">imprisonment</st>.

They were <st data-num="3034" class="">stoned</st>, <st data-num="4249">sawed apart</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="599" class="">murdered</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="3162" class="">sword;</st> they <st data-num="4022">went about</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3374" class="">sheepskins</st> and <st data-num="122" class="">goatskins</st>; they were <st data-num="5302" class="">destitute</st>, <st data-num="2346" class="">afflicted</st>, <st data-num="2558" class="">ill-treated</st>

(the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="514" class="">worthy</st> of <st data-num="3739">them</st>); they <st data-num="4105" class="">wandered</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2047" class="">deserts</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3735" class="">mountains</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4693" class="">caves</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3692" class="">openings</st> in the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> were <st data-num="3140" class="">commended</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> their <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, yet they did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2865" class="">receive</st> what was <st data-num="1860" class="">promised</st>.<n id="2" />
For God had provided something better for us, so that they would be made perfect together with us.
